summary: This is a female Dark Brotherhood Armor replacer
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Dark Brotherhood Female Gear
Author: Edhildil
11,30,2012
ver1


[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

Please read all of the description before you post a comment.

Update: added a standalone craftable version, you\'ll need latest Skyrim update as of 5/16/2013

This is a female Dark Brotherhood Armor replacer, I made it from scratch and Calientes CBBE body.

The lowerbody has been enhanced in the derrier region (buttock)
for a fuller, rounder profile. The waist is somewhat thinner.

The armor has cool features such as a Poison flask on the upper right breast (so you can easily grease up your blade/ arrows), daggers on the right thigh (for that special moment), some lockpicks on the right arm, (to break into your clients\' chateau), a coil of rope and grappling hook on your back that won\'t clip with bows or arrows (so you can escape the tower after slaying that important client), and a lower back pouch to collect ears, store notes and maps, or what not. Now I feel like a readied assasin wearing this.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Calientes Big Bottem Edition v 3.2 -You\'ll need this for all the body textures and hand, feet, face/head meshes, etc. 

[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]

1)Unzip the file to a temporary folder and read the contents.

2)Choose which version you want, Busty or Medium. (you can only use one size, see below)

Open the folder you want and copy/paste the data folder into your \"skyrim\" folder
(without the quotes).

this should add the following files:

dbarmortorso_f_0.nif
dbarmortorso_f_1.nif

into this folderpath:

Data\\meshes\\armor\\dbarmor

3) Install the textures by opening the \"Dont_forget_this(textures)\" folder.copy/paste the data folder into your \"skyrim\" folder
(without the quotes).

this should add the following files:
 
DBgeaerblk.dds
DBgeaerblk_n.dds
leatherblackDB.dds
leatherblackDB_n.dds

into this folderpath:

\\Data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor

Now your ready to slay, but you need to get the Shrouded Armor ingame.
Why? Because this replaces the Dark Brotherhood armor for female characters.
(see description above)

[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

Delete these files:

dbarmortorso_f_0.nif
dbarmortorso_f_1.nif

from this folderpath:

Data\\meshes\\armor\\dbarmor

and:

DBgeaerblk.dds
DBgeaerblk_n.dds
leatherblackDB.dds
leatherblackDB_n.dds

from this folderpath:

\\Data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor

[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9223/bugske.png[/img]

I only made two separate sizes, busty and medium. Why? because every time I try to make Bodyslide usable meshes my computer explodes and then I have to go down to the freeway offramp and panhandle coin for a new computer. So I am NOT going to make Bodyslide versions as of now. I also don\'t like the effects of BBP, so I\'m NOT doing that either as of now. Please don\'t ask for requests of these, I will go into a PTSD mouth foaming rampage and have to be re-admitted into the mental institute. This alone took 20 long hours. Thank you.

Even though I thought I got the Skyrim supported version of NifSkope,
it will not show me the dismemberment vertices,(AARGH!)so I may have the 
dismemberments off, I will fix this when I can figure out the dismemberment vertices.
This armor seems unaffected during testing so far. This means that some combinations of gloves and/or boots may behave weird.

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente (CBBE body)
Edhildil (Armor meshes and textures)  

Tools:
========================
Blender
Gimp 2
Nifskope
my brain, eyes, and hands

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]


-E

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
